description: Ayase wants to give Kirino a present that the otaku would be happy about, and asks Kyousuke for help. After brainstorming with Saori and Kuroneko the three get a great idea for a present that Kirino would love; unfortunately it`s not for sale but the prize for a cosplay event of Kirino`s favorite anime! Ayase gets furious over the suggestion of her participating in this competition... but then she has an idea.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas porter ce genre de cosplay
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Cosplay na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Cosplay Like This
俺の妹がこんなにコスプレなわけがない
